result.execSummary:
The defendant Krysta Marie Rouer was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Methamphetamine, a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(g).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Imposed/stayed 3 1/2 years WI Prison. 18 months IC/2 years ES. Eligible for prison programs.

miscConds.notes: Court costs of $288 and DNA surcharge of $250 payable to the COC office at the rate of $100/month commencing 7/17/2022. Submit DNA sample. Default of payment debt referred to SDC. Supervision fees payable to DOC during probation.

No possession/consumption of alcohol, controlled substance w/out valid Rx, and/or drug paraphernalia.
Can possess alcohol for employment purposes only.

Obtain/maintain full time employment or part time if in school or counseling.
Take all medications as prescribed by Dr and approved by agent.
Complete all assessments/counseling/treatment deemed necessary by agent.
Reside w/ parents upon release.
Court grants expungement upon defendant successfully completing sentence.

records.addlTxt:
1:01 PM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court, in custody.  Attorney Jon G Spansail in court for Krysta Marie Rouer.  Attorney Edward Daniel Burke Jr. in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim rights. Court on PSI. No additions/corrections to the factual content of the PSI by the State or Defense. Court has reviewed letter efiled by defendant's mother. State's recommendations. Atty Spansail makes stmt. Defendant makes stmt. Court makes stmt. Court sentence; Imposed/stayed 3 1/2 years WI Prison (18 months IC/2 years ES/eligible for prison programs), 2 years DOC probation w/ conditions, AODA assessment and follow through, complete all assessments/counseling/treatment deemed necessary by agent, no possession/consumption of alcohol, controlled substance w/out Rx, and/or drug paraphernalia, can possess alcohol for employment purposes only, take all medication as prescribed by Dr and approved by agent, obtain/maintain full time employment or part time if in school or counseling, reside w/ parents upon release, court costs of $288 and DNA surcharge of $250 payable to the COC office at the rate of $100/month commencing 7/17/2022 until paid in full, submit DNA sample, time served (96 days). If defendant successfully completes sentence the Court grants expungement. Supervision fees payable to DOC during probation. Default of payment debt referred to SDC.
Expungement Review scheduled for June 17, 2024 at 07:00 am.

10:04 AM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court, in custody, with attorney Jon G Spansail.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court makes stmt. State's Exhibit #1 - plea negotiations marked/received and reviewed by the Court. Defendant waives reading of count 1. Court reviews count 1 w/ the defendant. Defendant enters a plea of GUILTY to count 1. Count 2 will be dismissed/read-in. PLQ received/reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant. Recess 10:07 AM. Resume 10:08 AM. Appearances remain the same. Court resumes reviewing the PLQ w/ the defendant. Defendant advised of voting and firearms rights re felony conviction. Court finds defendant's plea is made freely and voluntarily and accepts the plea. Factual basis found. Adjudged guilty. Court orders PSI. Present bond cont'd.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for June 17, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

10:08 AM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court, in custody, with attorney Jon G Spansail. Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rachael Race/VWC in court. Information filed/received. Defendant understands charges and stands mute. Court enters NOT GUILTY plea to all counts. Present bond cont'd.

10:02 AM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court, in custody, with attorney Jon G Spansail. Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rachael Race/VWC in court. Court makes stmt. PQW (efiled on 3/25/2022) reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant and Atty Spansail. Court finds the waiver to be freely and voluntarily made and accepts waiver. Court further finds probable cause a felony has been committed and defendant is bound over to the circuit court. Court proceeds w/ ARGN.

10:05 AM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court, in custody, with attorney Jon G Spansail. Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Rachael Race/VWC in court. Court makes stmt. Atty Spansail makes stmt re his bond motion. Defendant makes stmt. Atty Spansail makes stmt. State heard on their position of bond - no objection to what is being proposed. Court continues current bond. Court requesting more information regarding program defendant is seeking and confirmation it is inpatient. If requested information is received, Court will consider modifying the bond.  Plea hearing scheduled for April 22, 2022 at 10:00 am.

02:37 PM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court with attorney Jon G Spansail.  Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in custody.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  PH waive time limits.  Bond motion to be filed. Bond continues.  Motion hearing scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.  Waiver of Prelim scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt: w/conditions   Defendant shall not possess/consume alcoholic beverages.  Defendant shall not possess/consume any illegal drugs, drug paraphernalia/controlled substances without a valid prescription.  Defendant shall not have direct or indirect contact w/NRG.    Defendant shall immediately report to the Sheriff's Department for fingerprinting and photographing.  Cannot reside w/mother JLR (contact allowed).

11:06 AM Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in court with attorney Jon G Spansail, SPD, for bond.  Deft. does qualify for SPD.  Defendant Krysta Marie Rouer in custody.  Edward Daniel Burke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  VWC present.  Krysta Marie Rouer appeared by video means with Attorney.   Deft. given complaint, advised of charges, and advised of right to counsel.  Bond is set.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 17, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
